author: Simon Difford
description: Coconut flavours are subtle in this surprisingly dry highball. If you self-carbonate your coconut water then consider also adding a touch of sugar to compensate for the bittering effect of the CO2 on the coconut water, so also enhancing coconut flavours.
name: Coconut Highball

recipeInstructions.text: POUR all ingredients into ice-filled glass

video.description: Coconut flavours are subtle in this surprisingly dry highball. If you self-carbonate your coconut water then consider also adding a touch of sugar to compensate for the bittering effect of the CO2 on the coconut water, so also enhancing coconut flavours.
video.name: HOWTO make Coconut Highball
